fields.description: The name of the rule. This must be unique within the parent service. You must not use any of the following reserved strings - `default`, `requested` or `service`.
fields.name: RuleName

fields.description: A precedence value that is used to decide between data flow policy rules when identifying the QoS values to use for a particular SIM. A lower value means a higher priority. This value should be unique among all data flow policy rules configured in the mobile network.
fields.name: RulePrecedence

fields.description: The QoS policy to use for packets matching this rule. If this field is null then the parent service will define the QoS settings.
fields.name: RuleQosPolicy

fields.description: The set of data flow templates to use for this data flow policy rule.
fields.name: ServiceDataFlowTemplates

fields.description: Determines whether flows that match this data flow policy rule are permitted.
fields.name: TrafficControl
